title: Whiterockinvestment
author: Whiterockinvestment
content: I give Loans i have biggger plans but let's start by little steps first.AT the moment i give out only TRX Loans no collateral needed only small ammounts.The verification that borrower will be Same person Will be wallet based.  You build your credit history with your wallet so wallet Addresses wich has better credit history can get bigger loans in future. All your credit history Will be wallet based you lose access in your wallet then your credit history gone Also.If you have credit history you can get bigger ammount of Loans.Cryptocurrency can give power to common men what was possible only for wall Street and bankers now we the average people will do the Same we use cryptocurrency as Empowerring tool to improve and expand our financial abilities to operate with capital.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Too many hassle in the forum last couple of weeks

comments.body: Loan request: $100 USDT Trc-20Repayment amount: $110Loan Duration: 28 days from funding.Purpose: recharge lightning wallet.Wallet address:*edit*Update 2023-08-01Loan request taken off of the table after one week.

comments.author: GH2022
comments.body: Loan request: $70 of TRX Repayment amount: $140 in TRX, BTC, ETH, MON or other CryptocurrencyLoan Duration: 48 hours from receiving the loanPurpose: Converting the $70 of TRX to buy the equivalent amount in Bitcoin, which I will then use as stated in previous post (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460870.0) to repay the loan in full + a $70 gratitude/thank you 'tip' as well.Wallet address: TNiovrdnmzmeaH1g3YEUZxBZeXMar42gC2 (Guardia Wallet which accepts TRX, TRX-10 and TRX-20)

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: LMFAOOOO July 22, 2023, 07:34:20 PM - Registered account on the forumJuly 22, 2023, 07:39:53 PM - Made the first post offering no collateral loansJuly 22, 2023, 07:46:16 PM -  Logged out and disappeared up to nowAll for what? Trying to troll?   Quote from: Whiterockinvestment on July 22, 2023, 07:39:53 PM  You build your credit history with your wallet so wallet Addresses wich has better credit history can get bigger loans in future. I think I have seen a similar statement before. Just that my memory is a bit foggy.
